items.name: AI intake and conflicts for mid-market firms
items.idea_summary: Context-aware AI for intake and conflicts management. Recurring daily. $2K-10K/yr. Why now: intake/conflicts are strategic control points; 70% pressure for efficiency; only 20% get value at scale—gap for coordinated workflows.
items.why_now_thesis: AI adoption past pilots; firms need matter-level workflows. Intake/conflicts identified as control points. Context-aware AI vs generalist.

items.name: AI contract drafting for SMB legal
items.idea_summary: AI drafts standard contracts, reduces billable hours on routine work. Recurring weekly. $1.5K-6K/yr. Why now: 81% expect business model change; routine work readily automatable.
items.why_now_thesis: BCG: AI drives efficiency; billable-hour model under pressure. Routine drafting automatable. SMB wedge.

items.name: Governance framework for law firm AI
items.idea_summary: AI governance and compliance for law firms—client guidelines, audit trails. Recurring weekly. $3K-12K/yr. Why now: client AI guidelines and compliance demands complex.
items.why_now_thesis: Artificial Lawyer: governance frameworks critical. Compliance demands increasing. Risk: legal/accounting as primary value—ensure operational focus.
